ExistMakerEarningDistributionTask().details: Throws an error indicating that a maker earning distribution task already exists.

ExistMarketEarningDistributionTask().details: Throws an error indicating that a market earning distribution task already exists.

OnlyAccessableByDao().details: Throws an error indicating that the caller is not the DAO.

OnlyAccessableByVault().details: Throws an error indicating that the caller is not the chromatch vault contract.

params.token: The address of the settlement token.

createMakerEarningDistributionTask(addre.details: This function can only be called by the Chromatic factory contract or the DAO.      Throws an `ExistMakerEarningDistributionTask` error if a maker earning distribution task already exists for the token.

params.token: The address of the settlement token.

createMarketEarningDistributionTask(addr.details: This function can only be called by the Chromatic factory contract or the DAO.      Throws an `ExistMarketEarningDistributionTask` error if a market earning distribution task already exists for the market.

params.token: The address of the settlement token.
The address of the settlement token.

returns.canExec: True if the distribution can be executed, otherwise False.
returns.execPayload: The payload for executing the distribution.

returns.canExec: True if the distribution can be executed.
returns.execPayload: The payload for executing the distribution.

cancelMakerEarningDistributionTask(addre.notice: Cancels a maker earning distribution task for a token.

cancelMarketEarningDistributionTask(addr.notice: Cancels a market earning distribution task for a market.

createMakerEarningDistributionTask(addre.notice: Creates a maker earning distribution task for a token.

createMarketEarningDistributionTask(addr.notice: Creates a market earning distribution task for a market.

distributeMakerEarning(address).notice: Distributes the maker earning for a token to the each markets.

distributeMarketEarning(address).notice: Distributes the market earning for a market to the each bins.

resolveMakerEarningDistribution(address).notice: Resolves the maker earning distribution for a specific token.

resolveMarketEarningDistribution(address.notice: Resolves the market earning distribution for a market.
